name: Virus Attack 2020
description:
This is a simple tapper game, be the Virus, infect the masses and multiply but avoid the protected and the obstacles. This is just a fun game I made to pass the time during this #socialdistancing. It's 100% free with no ads. Just for fun don't judge me too harshly, please.

• fun

• 0 adds
• help a brother out
• fun

This is a APK for Android devices. appropriate actions must be made to use this file on your device.
